item.title: Samba server en Linux
item.description: Creo que no hace falta ninguna de esas configuraciones solo tenes que agregar la contrase침a. sudo smbpasswd -a esotericwarfare sudo apt install samba -y sudo systemctl stop smbd mkdir linuxshare vim /etc/samba/smb.conf Agreg치 lo siguiente: [global] server role = standalone server map to guest = bad user usershare allow guests = yes hosts allow = 192.168.0.0/16 hosts deny = 0.0.0.0/0 [linuxsharename] comment = Open Linux Share path = /home/imlauer/linuxshare read only = no guest ok = yes force user = imlauer force group = imlauer Ejecut치: testparm para probar la configuraci칩n.
